> <OLD>
>
> �Yessss�the only idea made Hydras smile�Posibilities are  infinite... and 
> abotu the protophorm is it male or female?�

Cryotek pursed his lips thoughtfully as he looked at the protophorms.
"The one on the left there." he pointed to the one that looked to be
more of the 'standard' protoform. "That one is male." He then gestured
to the black one, the one with the temporal signature. "The other one
is female."

"Why?" Cryotek asked as he looked back at Hydras, "What are you
planning?" his voice betrayed a hint of curiousity as well as caution,
he was not one to be trifled with.

(TAG)

Preston
